jobDescription: Your future starts here! We're in need of people who are excited to become part of a team working hands-on, people eager to develop the skills they need to succeed. Due to our continued growth, we are looking to add machine operators to our 2nd and 3rd shift teams (4pm-12am / 12am-8am). Qualified candidates must be able to follow operator instructions and inspect parts, be able to work well with others, and be willing to work overtime. We offer great benefits including:
